name: Bott
body:
About
***

Bot on Turing Test shortly abbreviated bott is a chat bot. More information at http://code.google.com/p/bott

Deployment
***


1. Clone the git repo; git clone git@github.com:kailashbuki/bott.git
2. python run_bott.py

> NOTE:   There's also an exe for windows machine. 
>         Download the compressed file from executable section, 
>         uncompress it and double click it to run.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
